page.title: 19HOUSING IN YATE
page.content: In our area the modern houses have a rear entrance for cars.The fronts of the houses do not lead right onto a road.Our roads are all cul de sacs so there is no through traffic.The houses are made of brick and have tiled roofs.They are bigger and much more luxurious.An average house nowadays would probably have a toilet, about, three bedrooms, a bathroom, a living room, a kitchen, and maybe a dining room.With heating costs high, insulation is now very important.Many houses have insulation in their loft, strips of insulation around their doors and insulation between their walls.
